    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Merchant's Guile](/Equipment.aspx?ID=477)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Fall of Plaguestone</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 58</row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Three Actions" /><row>envision, interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The band of this ring is made from blue-colored iron and has two sharp, decorative protrusions on each side of the red-stone inlay. It feels quite heavy and reliable. Wearing this ring grants you a +2 item bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) and [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks, but only if the associated checks involve haggling or bargaining over a purchase or trade.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
